version.description1: Config version number used for auto_regen_outdated.

auto_regen_outdated.description: Should this file automatically regenerate whenever the default options are changed?

special_behaviour_rarity.description: 1 in this number chance for Things to get each special ability.

max_miniboss_tier.description: Maximum tier that minibosses can grow to. They start at tier 0.

crawler_merge_chance.description: 1 in this number chance every tick to attempt to merge.

burrowing.description: Most Things should be able to burrow if they cannot reach where they are trying to pathfind to.

max_griefing_hardness.description1: The maximum hardness that Things can break. Set to a negative value to disable all Thing block breaking.
max_griefing_hardness.description2: Blocks with negative hardness values can never be broken.
max_griefing_hardness.description3: To blacklist specific blocks, add to the thing_immune tag using a data pack.

revealed_damage_multiplier.description1: The damage multiplier for revealed tier Things such as Chest Spitters and Vine Tentacles when not vulnerable
revealed_damage_multiplier.description2: 0.0 means they will take no damage, 0.5 means they will take half damage, 1.0 means they will take full damage

fodder_damage_multiplier.description1: The damage multiplier for fodder tier Things such as Blood Crawlers when not vulnerable
fodder_damage_multiplier.description2: 0.0 means they will take no damage, 0.5 means they will take half damage, 1.0 means they will take full damage

split_damage_multiplier.description1: The damage multiplier for split tier Things such as Crawlers and DogBeast Spitters when not vulnerable
split_damage_multiplier.description2: 0.0 means they will take no damage, 0.5 means they will take half damage, 1.0 means they will take full damage

standard_damage_multiplier.description1: The damage multiplier for standard tier Things such as Juliette Things and DogBeasts when not vulnerable
standard_damage_multiplier.description2: 0.0 means they will take no damage, 0.5 means they will take half damage, 1.0 means they will take full damage

elite_damage_multiplier.description1: The damage multiplier for elite tier Things such as Palmer Things and Impalers when not vulnerable
elite_damage_multiplier.description2: 0.0 means they will take no damage, 0.5 means they will take half damage, 1.0 means they will take full damage

merged_damage_multiplier.description1: The damage multiplier for merged tier Things such as Split Faces and Prowlers when not vulnerable
merged_damage_multiplier.description2: 0.0 means they will take no damage, 0.5 means they will take half damage, 1.0 means they will take full damage

miniboss_damage_multiplier.description1: The damage multiplier for miniboss tier Things such as Blair Things and Beasts when not vulnerable
miniboss_damage_multiplier.description2: 0.0 means they will take no damage, 0.5 means they will take half damage, 1.0 means they will take full damage

special_miniboss_damage_multiplier.description1: The damage multiplier for special_miniboss tier Things such as Alien Things when not vulnerable
special_miniboss_damage_multiplier.description2: 0.0 means they will take no damage, 0.5 means they will take half damage, 1.0 means they will take full damage
